Name: Barnum Was Right
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A gin apricot sour balanced and favoured with generous dashes of aromatic bitters.
History: Named for Barnum Was Right , a 1929 American comedy film released with sounds and also as a silent version for theatres not wired for sound. Only the silent version serves. Adapted from a recipe in Crosby Gaige's 1941 Crosby Gaige's Cocktail Guide & Ladies' Companion .
Nutrition: One serving of Barnum Was Right contains 200 calories
